alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern Lincoln County; Far Northeast Highlands; Guadalupe County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 12 at 9:33AM MST until January 13 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, north central, and northeast New Mexico. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Low visibility from blowing snow will be possible, especially in mountain areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Erratic high wind gusts along I-25 between Las Vegas and Raton will occur.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
